name: intune-diagnostics
description: Modern web app for Intune diagnostics with Agentic AI

scripts.dev: concurrently --name backend,frontend --prefix name --restart-tries=100 --restart-after=2000 "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-exclude services/kusto_mcp_service.py --reload-exclude services/auth_service.py --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.start: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
